tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_imagery_records (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    image_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    image_resolution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Satellite_Stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    cloud_cover FLOAT,
    resolution INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (image_id) REFERENCES Satellite_Images(image_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(100),
    acquisition_date DATE,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(50),
    image_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id),
    cloud_coverage DECIMAL(5,2),
    image_resolution VARCHAR(20),
    image_quality VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_metadata (
    metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT REFERENCES satellite_images(image_id),
    capture_location VARCHAR(100),
    capture_time TIMESTAMP,
    image_size_mb DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE SatelliteImages (
    image_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_title VARCHAR(255),
    image_date DATE,
    image_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Satellites (
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE,
    mission_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ImageTags (
    tag_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    tag_name VARCHAR(255),
    tag_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ImageLocations (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE ImageAnnotations (
    annotation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id UUID,
    annotation_text TEXT,
    annotation_date DATE
)
